mapper.update: update sf_order_freight set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sf_order_id = #{sfOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ship_man_id = #{shipManId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ship_man_name = #{shipManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, freight = #{freight,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, sf_order_id, ship_man_id, ship_man_name, freight from sf_order_freight
